Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION
REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Relates to increasing the authorized reimbursement rate paid to governmental entities for enforcement of navigation laws
Summary: Restores the authorized reimbursement rate paid to governmental entities for enforcement of navigation laws to 75% of authorized expenditures.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the navigation law, in relation to the authorized reimbursement rate paid to governmental entities for local navigation enforcement expenditures
